Criteria / Definition: Categorized based on rating (e.g., Cat A/B/C) or list (e.g., Listed Company).
Purpose for Risk Underwriting: Credit Policy Segmentation. Indicates job stability and low default risk.

Parameter: Current Salary Credit Type (only if deposited in the bank)
Criteria / Definition: How salary is received as per bank statement.
Purpose for Risk Underwriting: Verification of Income. Must be consistent, non-cash credit.

Criteria / Definition: Minimum months/years at the present job.
Total years of professional experience.
Purpose for Risk Underwriting: Career stability and long-term income profile.

Criteria / Definition: Minimum CIBIL score required.
Hard inquiries recorded in the Enquiry Section.
Purpose for Risk Underwriting: Velocity Check/Credit Hunger. Too many applications signal desperation.

Criteria / Definition: Hard inquiries recorded in the Enquiry Section.

Same as DTI (Debt-to-Income Ratio) - (Total EMIs/NMI)×100.
Verification of EPFO employer/employee contribution to cross-check income/employment.
Purpose for Risk Underwriting: Digital Fraud Check. Provides independent employment confirmation.

Criteria / Definition: Checking if the borrower's identity is on an internal/external fraud watchlist.
Purpose for Risk Underwriting: Fraud Prevention. Mandatory for every application.

Criteria / Definition: MCA
Checking the borrower's residence/office pin code against a high-risk location list.
Purpose for Risk Underwriting: Geographic Risk Assessment. Default rates can vary by location.
